attributes.action: Foreign lorry drivers on UK roads
attributes.additional_details:
Bring in a mandatory UK road driving test for all foreign lorry drivers using UK roads and mandatory 6 monthly Satellite Navigation updates to cover all countries the lorries drive in.
Ambulances attend incidents caused by lost foreign lorry drivers struggling with out of date sat navs on unfamiliar road systems in the UK every day, please help me reduce the number of victims.
